    Interviewing at Interpublic Group

    1. Jul 26, 2014

       

      Chief Executive Officer Interview

      Anonymous Interview Candidate
      No Offer

      Application

      I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Interpublic Group.

      Interview

      Unresponsive during the process. Interview was awkward and tough to get a good discussion going. Was made to feel as if there wasn't really a job open. No clear view on job or initial priorities. Tough to tell if this was an opportunity or kamikaze mission.

      Interview Questions

      • lacklustre questions   Answer Question
      Interpublic Group 2014-07-26 09:00 PDT
